item.g:title: Mini Pure Chilli No. 5 - Our Hottest Hot Sauce
Mini Gourmet Reaper Chilli Flakes - Carolina Reaper 2.2 Million Scoville
Mini Pizza Pizzazz - Best Chilli Oil for Pizza
Mini Ever So English Hot Sauce - Gourmet Chilli Sauce
Mini Sriracha Cha-Cha-Cha - Mini Sriracha Hot Sauce
Mini Totally Thai - Thai Spicy Stir-fry Chilli Sauce

Mini Perfect Piri Piri - Gourmet Piri Piri Hot Pepper Sauce
Mini Chinese Hot and Sour - Chinese Hot Chilli Sauce
Mini Jamaican Jerk Hot Sauce | Jamaican Hot Sauce
Mini Devilish Dijon - Hot Mustard Sauce
item.g:description:
June’s limited-edition chilli sauce is our healthy take on Mustard. Devilish Dijon is a mustard hot sauce that can add flavour and enhance any savory dish you make. At home next to the BBQ, a juicy steak or even some ribs feel assured you will spice up your meal with this luxury condiment.
Made with a variety of healthy ingredients and superfoods you can enjoy this sauce without a guilty conscience. Also comes in luxury packaging for a gift or a present to yourself.
Be a rebel with this mini version of our Devilish Dijon – try it out now!

item.g:title: Tasting Bottle Holder - Bottles Not Included
item.g:description: Tasting bottle stand to use with your Kitchen or BBQ Collection gift sets. Use this wooden stand at the table, at the grill or in the kitchen so you can easily access your Chilli No. 5 tasting bottles. This does NOT include the tasting bottles.

item.g:title: BBQ Set
item.g:description:
When you're grilling al fresco, your tools can be as sharp as the rest of your wardrobe. These smart BBQ tools help you get that chargrilled flavour without getting burnt.
The set includes spatula, tongs and fork, in a tidy, woven zip-up black branded Chilli No. 5 bag.
